However, it contains notable factual discrepancies vs the Gold Answer/transcript:
- COPD duration: it states COPD was diagnosed “a couple years ago” [P-1], but the patient clarifies it was ~5 years ago [P-2].
- Baseline sputum: it states “previously clear to yellow,” whereas the patient corrected themselves to “clear to white” before becoming “more yellow” [P-6].

These errors don’t overturn the central conclusion but do reduce factual accuracy.
